page.title: 01Area North of Belper,Derbys.
page.content: {Belper}is situated in a valley and has the{River Derwent}running through it. The{Belper Mill}is on the North border and our area lies between here and{ {Ambergate.}The area is mainly hilly and is mostly farmland with a few housing estates of council and private homes. Other parts are built up and industrial. The Mill stands by the side of the River Derwent from where the original Mill got its power. It was built by {Jedediah Strutt}whose family changed Belper from the centre of the nail trade to the centre of the cotton industry. There is the{Riverside {Pavilion}used for social events and the{Riverside Gardens,}both near the Mill. On Crich Lane there is{Ridgeway {Hospital}and across from the hospital is a factory,which produces plastic.
